topics.title: Component Placement
topics.description: The placement of components on the quadcopter, including the receiver and flight controller.
evidence_quotes: Now what you'll be left with is the receiver.
I wouldn't put this on top of the flight controller...

topics.title: Component Selection
topics.description: The selection of components for the quadcopter, including batteries and heat shrinks.
evidence_quotes: I'll have links to the batteries to use for this.
I'll also have the links for the heat shrinks...

topics.title: Quadcopter Build
topics.description: The process of building a quadcopter, including component selection and placement.
evidence_quotes: I really like that yellow on there.
All you need to do is find a placement for your receiver.

topics.title: Soldering Process
topics.description: The importance of proper soldering technique, including cleaning and heating the area before soldering.
evidence_quotes: You always want it to look like this. You want it to look super shiny and super clean.
And that means that the heat's going to transfer very quickly.

topics.title: Soldering Safety
topics.description: The importance of caution when soldering, including avoiding overheating and ensuring proper heat transfer.
evidence_quotes: You don't want to hit it with the tip just like this. You want to actually kind of get as much of a flat area as possible

topics.title: Temperature Control
topics.description: The importance of setting a suitable temperature for soldering and monitoring its effects.
evidence_quotes: It depends on the power supply that you're using for it. It just dictates how fast it heats up.

topics.title: Topic 1: Careful Analysis
topics.description: The importance of careful analysis in various contexts.
evidence_quotes: Try not to bend the VTX antenna so much because it'll probably end up breaking.

topics.title: Topic 2: Soldering and Repair
topics.description: The challenges of soldering and repairing delicate components.
evidence_quotes: Soldering one of those back into place is much more difficult, especially if you're new.

topics.title: Topic 3: Camera Installation
topics.description: The process of installing a camera and adjusting its position.
evidence_quotes: And obviously, we want the camera to point forward.
